title:
Computational inverse scattering with internal sources: a reproducing
  kernel Hilbert space approach
authors: Yakun Dong, Kamran Sadiq, Otmar Scherzer, John C. Schotland
abstract:
We present a method to reconstruct the dielectric susceptibility (scattering
potential) of an inhomogeneous scattering medium, based on the solution to the
inverse scattering problem with internal sources. We employ the theory of
reproducing kernel Hilbert spaces, together with regularization to recover the
susceptibility of two- and three-dimensional scattering media. Numerical
examples illustrate the effectiveness of the proposed reconstruction method.
